vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Τίτος, -ου, ὁ
Titus;
__1. St. Paul's disciple and companion: 2Co.2:13 7:6 7:13-14 8:6 8:16 8:23 12:18, Gal.2:1, 3, 2Ti.4:10, Tit.1:4, subscr., Rec. (Τῖτος).
__2. One surnamed Justus: Act.18:7, RV (T, WH, Τίτιος).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at 2Co.2.13
§ Titus, (Proper name), friend and helper of Paul, 2Cor. 2:13; 7:6; Gal. 2:1; 2Tim. 4:10; Tit. 1:4
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Tito: (1) compañero de Pablo ; (2) llamado Justo (HCH.18:7)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
提多 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 「養育」
外邦基督徒, 在保羅的某些旅程中是他的同伴
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
提多 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 「养育」
外邦基督徒, 在保罗的某些旅程中是他的同伴
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Tít: lãnh đạo Hội thánh và người bạn của Phao-lô
